title: Blackstone River Valley National Heritage Corridor: Safety
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Safety            safety        View of Valley Falls dam    Â    The Blackstone River Valley National Heritage Corridor covers 25 cities and towns. While travelling across the Corridor, you will find yourself in a mix of urban, suburban, and rural settings. Please always be aware of your surroundings. The National Park Service does not own or manage any property within the Heritage Corridor, so each individual community provides police, fire, and rescue services. Please follow all state and local laws and regulations while you are touring the Blackstone Valley.   In the case of an emergency, please call 911 from anywhere in the Valley
